org.wonderly.log
Class PrintStreamHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.util.logging.Handler
      java.util.logging.StreamHandler
          org.wonderly.log.PrintStreamHandler

public class PrintStreamHandler
extends StreamHandler

This is a simple Logger implementation that forces itself to initially use a StreamFormatter instance.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Gregg Wonderly - gregg.wonderly@pobox.com
